abstract: U S traders pleased with note
snippet: American foreign traders, who have chafed under England's interference with the mails since the outbreak of the war, expressed gratification yesterday over the latest protest filed with the British Government by Secretary Hull. Although neither ex...

headline.main: TRADERS GRATIFIED AT HULL'S PROTEST; Move on British Interference With Mails Praised as Forcing Change CENSORSHIP ALSO SCORED Importers Irritated at Delays on Documents Which Hold Up Cargoes Here

lead_paragraph: American foreign traders, who have chafed under England's interference with the mails since the outbreak of the war, expressed gratification yesterday over the latest protest filed with the British Government by Secretary Hull. Although neither exporters nor importers expected immediate action,...
